componentInstanceProperties.name: filter
componentInstanceProperties.value: (RecordType.Name = 'Decision' OR RecordType.Name = 'Issue' OR RecordType.Name = 'Risk') AND (NOT(PgM_Status__c = 'Closed')) AND (PgM_Visibility__c <> '1 - Workstream')

componentInstanceProperties.name: filter
componentInstanceProperties.value: (RecordType.Name = 'Decision' OR RecordType.Name = 'Issue' OR RecordType.Name = 'Risk') AND (NOT(PgM_Status__c = 'Closed')) AND (PgM_Visibility__c = '1 - Workstream')
